recipesJson.name: BluBalls (MelonBallr)
recipesJson.author: BradH
recipesJson.description: There was a local shop in town that had a juice called "melon baller" and I enjoyed the idea of it, but the juice was really nothing special. I had never heard of diy at the time, and I can't remember the brand. I'm going off of the slight memory that I have of this juice.
